scripts.test:issue-tracker: cd issue-tracker && cp sample.env .env && npm run test
scripts.test:manage-a-book-trading-club: cd manage-a-book-trading-club && cp sample.env .env && npm run test
scripts.test:personal-library: cd personal-library && cp sample.env .env && npm run test
scripts.test:stock-price-checker: cd stock-price-checker && cp sample.env .env && npm run test
